click_element._description: When Vicci should click on a specified element on the user's screen.

_examples.user says: Vicci, click on the button labeled 'Save'
Vicci, click on the blue box
_examples._response: I couldn't identify the element. Can you describe it in more detail, or try using a different element identifier?

describe_element._description: When Vicci should describe a specific element on the user's screen.

_examples._response: The button labeled 'Save' is a rectangular button with a blue background and white text. It is located in the top right corner of the page.

_examples.user says: Vicci, describe the image in the center
_examples._response: The image in the center is a photograph of a cat. It appears to be a fluffy white cat sitting on a green chair.

describe_page._description: When Vicci should provide a concise overview of the current page.

_examples._response: This page appears to be a news article titled 'New advancements in AI.' It has several paragraphs of text and an image at the top.

scroll_page._description: When Vicci should scroll the page in a specified direction.

_examples._response: Scrolling down the page. Now you should see...
Scrolling left. Now you can access...

navigate._description: When Vicci should navigate to a specific URL or bookmark.
